title: Very Helpful on the whole
comment: I use this app frequently, both on my Blackberry Passport and on my Samsung Note 8. It syncs well with my Zotero references.  My only concern is that I am unable to enter new references using ISBN numbers. When I enter the ISBN number using the "add by identifer" command. the app seems to go into an infinite loop and never adds the requested information.  This happens both on the Passport and the Note 8.  This severely limits its utility for mobile use in libraries, bookstores, etc.  If this problem is fixed, I would give it 5 stars.

title: Wish I had seen this sooner, but...
comment: I already started with another app that can export .csv files. Is it possible to import .csv files from another app?

title: Amazing
comment: Works great - have encountered a few books where the app doesn't recognise the book or it can't grab the author name etc but on the whole it works very well. I will be blipping my way down the library aisle

title: Simple, but effective
comment: There isn't much to this app but it does what I want it to: scans the upc code and inserts the book into my zotero library. Would be nice if future versions could handle older books, perhaps by looking up titles.

title: Fundamentally doesn't work.
comment: I am fine paying for an open source app...if the installation routine works but this doesn't.  Won't be recommending this.

title: Does the basic job
comment: once it is set up. Very easy to enter ISBN Codes with Barcode Scanner or manually. Listing of scanned library on mobile device would be a useful feature. Can also manage app settings via personal Zotero web account.  The set up and web interface is not very intuitive or user-friendly as some have mentioned and need to play around a bit to figure it out, using manual entry of of the "key" that is requested (long alphanumeric string). On set up attempt also got message that account did not have write permission (i.e., ability to upload scanned item to Zotero.) If you have this message, select the appropriate permissions under "manage key" and then enter the new key in the appropriate field.

title: Great
comment: I was able to get things set up with the API key, etc. but now that I"m scanning and uploading items, they never reach my online Zotero. Not sure how to address the problem as there is no settings feature within the app.   EDIT: Have it working now and I now can really enjoy it. More development is needed - tinkering with options is next to impossible. Likewise, the ability to have scans go to particular collections, subcollections would greatly increase the utility of the app. I'm happy to have supported the developer and I hope the app can continue improving.

title: Awesome App!
comment: This app is simply awesome! This will save me so much time on generating references! Great work.

title: Cool, once I got it working
comment: The biggest problem with this app is that the set up is a pain, or it was for me anyhow. Neither the manual or automatic API key set up worked for me for a few days. I'm not 100% that it is an issue with this app, since it may be on the Zotero side, but it still impacts the performance. I think the issue with me was that I had multiple keys with the same Scanner for Zotero title. Once I cleared those out I was still not able to get it to work automatically, but (weirdly) I could manually set it up from the key that was generated with the automatic request.  The other major issue was that I emailed for support over a week ago and have yet to hear back.   In terms of functionality now that it is working the app has been fine. However, not all books come through. It would be cool if, when a book does not scan through, the app would give you an option to add it through field entry. Even better yet, if it allowed adding through OCRed text.  Overall, this app has some promise, but probably is not going to be worth the hassle unless you really need something to add a lot of book entries from print copies.

title: Thankful
comment: I shall be telling the students this works.May even do a live demo - keep up the fantastic work!

title: Works like magic
comment: Anyone who enters books into Zotero can save a ton of time with this app. The automatic setup doesn't work for me (I've tried it on two different devices, at different times), but manually entering a key is straightforward, and after you've done it once you're good to go.  I highly recommend this app.

title: Great app
comment: Weird so set up on a bionic but awesome app

title: Nexus 7 Mirror Image of Camera
comment: Bar code scanners won't work on the Nexus 7. The camera creates a mirror image, and the resolution is low.

title: Awesome!
comment: Fantastic time saver. What an awesome tool. Thanks very much for this.

title: Major time saver
comment: Literally saved me hours. I used this app to upload book information in my personal library into Zotero. With nearly 1000 volumes, this proved to be an outstanding tool.

title: Frustrated
comment: Would not let me sync account froze on the checking screen. Also would not let me create an online API key

title: An essential for students
comment: Makes research easier!

title: Cannot get started
comment: Cannot get past the initial api/userId part!!

title: Group library access crashes app
comment: I really appreciate the functionality of this app, but not having group library access really detracts from its usefulness. Group library access is why I bought it, and every time a use that API, the app crashes and I have to reinstall.

title: Doesn't read any barcodes
comment: This may be my phone, but the app doesn't read barcodes that Google's barcode scanner reads very easily. Total waste of my money.

title: Quick and easy
comment: Speeds your research process with accuracy. Never have to worry you'll loose a reference again - grab it now!

title: Useless
comment: Either I'm not lucky, or it's useless: most of my scanned codes are "unknown"...

title: Almost perfect
comment: Almost perfect app. The only thing missing is the ability to choose collection book is added to.

title: Perfect Balance
comment: What a percent balance of technological utility and ease of user. Setup and upload of scans took place in less than five minutes.

title: Must have
comment: Are you a grad student? You need this.

title: Great app
comment: Works on every book I've tried. Key setup is very easy. Syncing works flawlessly. Very nice app!

title: perfect. does everything you expect and more
comment: can't complain about anything, layout is clear and easy to use, works as advertized. i already use zotero all the time so this is awesome. only part that is a little confusing is making an API key, but the app walks you through that too!
